entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Edson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 p.m. MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 11.3Â°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local smoke. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
